document.text:
From: 
To: 
Subject: FW: Corruption and Ghislaine 
Date: Mon, 06 Jul 2020 18:03:12 +0000 
Attachments: EpsteinO'ConnellMaxwell.pdf; BILL_O'CONNELLChildRapeVictim.pdf 
I think this is a repeat? 
Pls handle. 
From: Elle K 
Sent: Monday, July 6, 2020 12:41 PM 
To: 
Subject: Corruption and Ghislaine 
Hi, 
My name is Lisa Kenney and I reside in NH. I have been reporting a group of wealthy MA 
real estate developers, nightclub and restaurant owners, along with rogue police who cater 
to them, donate for them, and seemingly offer private police services to them. 
One of the MA troopers is the brother of the nightclub owners and he's close to pedophile 
wealthy developer Wm. O'Connell. (arrested for statutory rape and cocaine trafficking) 
I have come across new information which leads me to believe the above group is tied to 
Epstein, and even Ghislaine, but definitely the million dollar homes where she lived and the 
LLC's connected to them. 
I have attached these documents on both a Google doc and PDF file for your viewing. 
I know this group, with the exception of the pedophile and nightclub owners, because I was 
married to one I divorced over twenty years ago, I dated another, and socialized with them. 
I have been compiling their corruption for over ten years and have received enormous 
amounts of abuse and crimes committed against me for doing so, and LE hasn't done one 
thing to stop them. 
But, I'm still here sending my reports on them, and they're still issuing threats. They 
frequently tell me they will continue the abuse and destruction to my property as long as I 
keep reporting them and their ties to nightclub owners, political policing, O'Connell, and 
obvious money laundering. 
This pedophile's victim was killed in a fiery crash one week before his trial was to begin, so 
he got off those charges. But the similarities between both he and Epstein are astounding, 
and I'm sure they knew him. 
Google docs 
EFTA00021170

Epstein & Ghislaine 
Another wealthy predator who appears tied to Epstein and Ghislaine, 
Wm OConnell doc. 
See attached. 
Thank you, 
Lisa Kenney 
EFTA00021171
